title: S13 Ep143: Courage the Telepathic Dog
itunes:title: Courage the Telepathic Dog
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is going to the dogs today! Courage the telepathic Dog that is and his fantastic companion, Karen Rontowski share stories to amuse & amaze,

Karen Rontowski is a traveler, comedian, tarot reader and paranormal investigator. Today she joins the boys to speak of Pookas, Fairies, Ghosts and Animal Spirit Communication. It is a light and breezy fun fare as we slide into the holiday week!

Visit Karen here: https://www.karenrontowski.com/
